alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Kiowa; Pratt; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 16 at 7:05PM CDT until July 16 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Kiowa County in south central Kansas... Southwestern Stafford County in south central Kansas... Southeastern Edwards County in south central Kansas... Northwestern Pratt County in south central Kansas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 705 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Macksville, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and hail up to two inches in diameter. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Hopewell and Trousdale. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
